title: GIRLS GENERATION COMEBACK
body:
Girls' Generation’s 6th full length album "Holiday Night" will be released on August 4th, 6:00 PM (KST).
#소녀시대 #GIRLS6ENERAT10N #HolidayNight #DoubleTitleTracks #AllNight #Holiday #Release #170804
THEY RELEASE THEIR SONG ON MY BIRTHDAY (KILL ME RN)
When they release their new song please share it to other people and give it a like <3 thank u so much #SONESFOREVER

replies.body:
How is this relevant to league of legends haha!

P.S aren't you more excited for BTS's come back tho?!?
